snippet: A finding is good news for hospitals in poor countries, which may not be able to afford lamps to treat the problem.
abstract: Research shows natural sunlight filtered through plastic film is cheap, readily available way to treat infant jaundice in developing countries.
lead_paragraph: A finding is good news for hospitals in poor countries, which may not be able to afford lamps to treat the problem.

headline.main: Filtered Sunlight Is Good Cure for Infant Jaundice, Study Says
headline.print_headline: Filtered Sunlight Shown to Aid Infant Jaundice
